fields.perkEffect: No modifiers for being in the Zero-G condition.
fields.perkDescription: Zero-G Gyro assisted units do not suffer modifiers for the condition Zero-G because their specialist equipment allows them to target and perform actions easily when drifting.

fields.perkEffect: Can not Run and ignores suppressed condition.
A +2 Guard vs a single ranged attack in a turn. Additional attacks after the first are not affected by Bullet time.
Once per games Assault and Soak increased by +3 for Gruntz squad.
Can re-roll one dice from a shoot attack per turn. Second dice roll must be kept.
Can shoot twice on activation. Unit must sacrifice all move this turn and is at -1 to Guard when they let rip.
+2 inch to all moves in the Open. This makes a double move (run) 12 inches.
Once per game place all models totally within 12 inches of current location and in squad coherency. Unit can not move after Melt Away but can Shoot.
Become a neutral civilian or local non-hostile until gruntz squad opens fire or attacks an enemy unit.
Unit Coherency extended to 6 inches for gruntz with Battle Net.
Unit is +1 Guard after making a double move (run action).
Save one gruntz Droid model from being waxed on unit activation.
A +2 to shoot attacks when unit has not moved. Replaces normal +1 for not moving.
Additional +1 to Guard Statistic whilst in Cover.
Auto heal on unit activation by rolling a 5+ on a single D6 roll.
Unit can move through deep and shallow water at normal speed.
Place two markers on the table while unit is at least 10 inches away from enemy or out of LOS. Figures are revealed when an enemy is 10 inches away and in LOS.
When within Assault distance from an enemy biological unit see page 82 of rules.
Does not suffer Condition Brown  and is just suppressed rather  than entering condition brown.  Mental check rolls are made at -2  to the result.
Enemy Gruntz squad models  within 6" of the squad are at -2 shoot. Ignores line of sight.
When waxed or when self-detonating place a 2" AOE over them. Models touched by the AOE will take HE grenade damage. When waxed this model is removed from play and cannot be healed.
Re-Roll Mental checks.
Can deploy up to 18 inches into game table after initial deployment.
For every double rolled  for damage in assault, remove  one enemy model and add one  to the infected unit.
If they activate the jump the unit  has +2 Inches to a double move  and is not affected by rough  terrain, obstacles and can jump  over enemy units.
Once per game auto heal up to 3  Gruntz at the beginning of a unit  activation.
Paint a target within 12”. All friendly units get +1 to ranged    attacks against the painted unit    and in-direct artillery can target painted models that are out of LOS.
Power Armour can not use the Swarm Perk. Unit can not have Squad attachments or ranged weapons. Can Assault with 1 action rather than 2.
fields.perkDescription: A mob or swarm of alien or civilian Gruntz. This unit has more figures and a mob like ability to overwhelm enemy units. A swarm would normally be lightly armed and rely mostly on assault attacks.

fields.perkEffect: (Once per game) Mental control of unit or specialist within 8 inches. Make a skill statistic roll equal to or higher than target's Guard.
fields.perkDescription: Once per game the unit/character can attempt to take control of an enemy gruntz squad or organic specialist by making a successful skill check by rolling 2d6 equal to or over target Guard. If check is successful the player can activate the target enemy unit/character as one of his own units/characte

fields.perkEffect: Squad can not go prone
One command action can be used on activation of the Sub-Commander. Each command action uses one of the 3 command points which are not replenished.
Remove D3 damage Points or  attempt to repair a critical on a vehicle on 1 to 3.
Restore D3-1 Grunts from Waxed condition within 3" of Medic.
Soak is 15 until shield is overloaded.
+1 inch to base moves. Not affected by Rough terrain.
fields.perkDescription: Very agile troops skilled in traversing rough and difficult terrain. This can either be a hardware augmentation or a biological advantage that the unit has.

fields.perkEffect: Soak is 17 until shield is overloaded.
